title: The Secret of the Whistler (restored, colorized) (1946, film noir, imdb score: 6.3)

sources.title: The Secret of the Whistler (restored, colorized) (1946, film noir, imdb score: 6.3)
sources.description: The Secret of the Whistler is a 1946 American  mystery film   noir  based on the  radio drama   The Whistler . Directed by  George Sherman , the production features  Richard Dix ,  Leslie Brooks  and Michael Duane. It is the sixth of  Columbia Pictures ' eight " Whistler " films produced in the 1940s, all but the last starring Dix.
